msbt.message: Points: . Rank: . ☆Room Design Hint☆ It's a bit empty in there since you don't have much furniture. But the best is yet to come. Try getting as much furniture as possible!
Points: . Rank: . ☆Room Design Hint☆ Try collecting the essentials—the things you need for day-to-day life. Think chair, table, bed, and wardrobe or closet. That'll do!
Points: . Rank: . ☆Room Design Hint☆ Did you know there are some kinds of furnishings that you can hang on walls? These things can really alter the impression a home makes.
Points: . Rank: . ☆Room Design Hint☆ A little variety goes a long way. Consider adding clocks, plants, musical instruments—things that add some personal flair.
Points: . Rank: . ☆Room Design Hint☆ Here's a good trick! Try displaying furniture that's all the same color. Your home will look lovely and so well put together!
